item.title: I-5 South - Exits 678B and 678A

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 680 and 678B-A
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 680 - CA-299/Lake Blvd. Approaching Exit 678B-A - CA-44 Jct. CA-299 is the northern most east-west highway that connects the coast with Nevada in California.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 681B
